Get a good night's rest on the trail with The North Face's Assault tent, featuring waterproof DryWall laminate construction with breathable top vents, plenty of hanging tabs and an advanced DAC Featherlite NSL pole system in a rugged, single-wall design perfect for high-altitudes camps.
